Description.Text: The Winchester Deluxe offers a select choice of unique Studio s, One Bedroom and Two bedroom Suites. Designed to provide the ultimate in luxury and comfort reminiscent of a home away from home. The Flagship of the group and renown for its hospitality and unique style of service. The property aims to please and provides guests a very personalized service. Private and detached, the roof top pool provides an inviting option for a dip and spot for sunbathing. For the health conscious and fitness community. The property is fully equipped with a state of the art gymnasium. with a separate sauna facilities for ladies and gents. They also provide meetings and conferencing facilities. AH 05/09

A few kilometers away from The Dubai International Airport and centrally located in the heart of the Bur Dubai. The property is ideal for business and leisure with its proximity to the commercial, entertainment and shopping areas of the city.Providing a variety of options with easy access to the famous Bur Juman Shopping Mall,Al Khaleej Centre and The Al Ain Centre.

The Studios are spacious and elegantly designed.All Studio suites feature the latestin hi tech convenience,high speed internet, Flat screen LCD TV and a fully equipped kitchen including refrigerator,kettle,electric stove, microwave oven, washer,dryer as well as ironing facilities. Each individual unit been designed with either an open, semi or closed kitchen plan.The rest room is well maintained with a bath tub and shower.Comprehensive satellite television offering a choice of television programs.
A Modern mid rise building facing the main road with a light green and yellow facade.
The hotel serves an elaborate buffet for Breakfast in a private dining area.
A Modern medium sized lobby with a comfortable seating area. The reception is located in the lobby as you enter the hotel
